name: 2 Rock's 1 Beach
description:
2 Rock's 1 Beach

A brawler game made for our Game Art course where the focus was mainly on character design and animation.

The theme was "Minerals" and the art style is inspired by GrandChamaco

Play together locally or with Parsec

Cinematic trailer Controls

Character select

  • A - Select character
  • B - Deselect character
  • Select - Show character stats
  • Start - Starts game when both players have a character selected

Brawling

  • A - Attack
  • B - Heavy attack
  • X - Block

(Can only be played with two Xbox controller, sorry)
